Terry was an instructional aide at the local community college and is also a freelance graphic designer.  He now writes and self-publishes his own books, and is an avid bird watcher and photographer.

lenders.name: Ashland University SIFE
lenders.occupation: Students in Free Enterprise - Student Organization
lenders.occupational_info: Ashland University Students in Free Enterprise is a non-profit student organization at Ashland University's Dauch College of Business and Economics in Ashland, OH. SIFE members are volunteer students who's mission is to promote free enterprise through education with the goal of enabling others to become successful in a free market economy.

lenders.name: GLOBAL POVERTY RELIEF FO
lenders.loan_because: Our support of KIVA is part of a diversified "mutual fund" approach we offer individuals, companies and community groups preferring a professionally managed distribution of donations collectively received.
lenders.occupational_info:
The Global Poverty Relief Foundation is a humanitarian organization and not-for-profit registered charity whose mission is to help alleviate poverty in less developed communities outside Canada.

With no payroll obligations as all staff are volunteers, the foundation supports disaster and poverty relief programs under UNICEF, World Vision, Oxfam, CARE, Doctors Without Borders, the Red Cross and other international aid agencies.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: it seems like a good idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I produce theater, film and new media (internet & mobile).  I write and direct stories.  I also help people & companies market their movies and television.

lenders.occupational_info: we help traditional cultures save and protect themselves.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: A little can go a long way.

lenders.name: Greta
lenders.loan_because: luck dropped me into a life of privledge, opportunity, and family that believes in the duty we all have to lend a helping hand. We live in a beautiful world and hopefully piece by peace we will begin to realize the interconnectedness of all people. I'm here to spread my luck around.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I am giving back to the world, we are all living in this world together and need to allow our actions to do the talking.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother and I have a part time job outside the home.  I am very involved in raising funds for the childrens schools and my husband has his own business.  I know how hard it is starting out and wish these new businesses much success!

lenders.loan_because: I understand the flow of money and I would love to assist others in the positive experience of it. It also believe in being service to others and being a member of Kiva is an expression of that.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people in the ability to find answers and solutions within themselves. lenders.occupational_info: I am a full-time law student in Los Angeles, CA, and I am a Graduate Gemologist.  My primary law focus is on immigration, international law, human rights, asylum, and refugees.  I am also a diamond consultant for a diamond-cutting and retail firm.

lenders.occupational_info: I live in one of the most beautiful places on earth (of course we all think that, don't we), and coach people who want to improve their accent in English.  Sometimes, I make art. Sometimes I write resumes and sometimes I do translations of company HR documents.

lenders.name: Cynthia

Now through Kiva  I can learn about the progress and see if there are any results.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an upscale senior community in San Luis Obispo, Ca near the central coast of California. I work closely with seniors to make sure they are well taken care of and all their needs are provided for correctly.
